dcterms:description: The dataset includes a 104-hour synchronized multi-sensor naturalistic driving data, focusing on goal-oriented driver behavior classification involving video stream and CAN signal data.
dcterms:title: Honda Driving Dataset (HDD)

dcterms:description: TORCS is a driving simulator capable of simulating physically realistic vehicle dynamics and multiple sensing modalities to build sophisticated AI agents that can complete race tracks.
dcterms:title: TORCS Dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz

dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset provides a rich set of data for various tasks in autonomous driving, including stereo, optical flow, visual odometry, and 3D object detection.
dcterms:title: KITTI Dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Xu
Y. Gao

dcterms:description: The Berkeley Driving Dataset is designed for end-to-end learning of driving models from large-scale video datasets.
dcterms:title: Berkeley Driving Dataset

dcterms:description: Argoverse provides 3D tracking and forecasting with rich maps, aimed at advancing the state of the art in autonomous driving.
